actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations

official_title: A joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States requiring a review by the Congress of each rule and regulation issued to carry out any law and allowing the Congress to approve, modify, or disapprove such rules or regulation.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Requires the Congress to review each rule and regulation before it becomes effective to carry out any law. Authorizes the Congress to approve, modify, or disapprove any such rule or regulation.

titles.title: A joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States requiring a review by the Congress of each rule and regulation issued to carry out any law and allowing the Congress to approve, modify, or disapprove such rules or regulation.
